p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_99: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_102: If you're looking for training by highly qualified subspecialized radiologists with plenty of academic opportunities and state of the art equipment in a friendly environment, Beaumont's diagnostic radiology residency is for you. We want to see you succeed whether your goal is private practice or an academic future. We also offer the early specialization in interventional radiology program and a training pathway leading to dual certification in nuclear medicine and diagnostic radiology.
